Engine problem --- FIX

1)Go to game folder
2) find "settings.xml"
3) Edit and change monitor result
4) Save
5)Enjoy

VERY NICE GAMEPLAY.feels like a real war.thanks blackbox.i think its not a demo rather full game.thanks once again blackbox.

only problem i faced is after install.it says cant initialize engine.anyone having this particular prob just do the following.

1.install the game.
2.don't run the game.
3.go to the directory whr its being installed.
4.find settings.xml.
5.open it with notepad.
6.change the screen res to ur native dekstop res.like i changed the values to 1368 and 768.
7.save it inside the same directory.
8.run the game frm dekstop and enjoy!!! :)

I have downloaded and install the game and also apply the fix mentioned by some other members.The game also runs fine but the problem is that after clicking the 7554.exe the game starts after almost 25 minutes.Does anyone have any fix.Iam using windows 7 32 bit.Ihave 4gb ddr2 ram and 9800 nvidia gt video card.Nice game though.It really revives some good old memories of the Call Of Duty series.
